description: This file contains source code defining classes and functions for managing conversations, generating medical notes, saving notes locally, and assisting AI-driven follow-up questions within a healthcare chatbot backend.

classes.name: ConversationManager
classes.description: Manages creation and updating of conversation instances and their messages.

classes.name: NoteGenerator
classes.description: Generates medical notes from conversations, using AI summarization with fallback heuristics.

classes.name: LocalNoteStorage
classes.description: Handles saving generated notes as text files to a local or cloud-synced directory.

classes.name: LocalNoteStorageError
classes.description: Custom exception for errors during local note saving processes.

classes.name: AIConversationHelper
classes.description: Provides logic for dynamic follow-up questions and summaries during a clinical intake, driven by AI or heuristics.

methods.name: Conversation start_conversation(self, patient_id: str, metadata: dict | None = None)
methods.description: Creates a new conversation record for a given patient.

methods.name: Conversation append_messages(self, conversation_id: uuid.UUID, messages: List[Tuple[str, str]])
methods.description: Adds messages to an existing conversation based on a list of (sender, text) tuples.

methods.name: Conversation get_conversation(self, conversation_id: uuid.UUID)
methods.description: Retrieves a conversation by its ID.

methods.name: Tuple[str,str] generate_note(self, conversation: Conversation, note_title: str = "")
methods.description: Generates a summarized or heuristic note from a conversation, optionally using AI.

methods.name: dict save_text_file(self, filename: str, content: str)
methods.description: Saves content as a text file in a specified local or cloud directory.

methods.name: str next_follow_up(self, conversation: Conversation)
methods.description: Determines the next AI-driven question or summary in the medical intake dialog, progressing through predefined clinical domains.

methods.name: dict _init_metadata(self, conversation: Conversation)
methods.description: Initializes conversation metadata for intake domain tracking and coverage.

methods.name: None _update_coverage(self, meta: dict, next_domain: str | None)
methods.description: Updates which clinical domains have been asked and coverage metrics.

methods.name: str|None _determine_next_domain(self, meta: dict, patient_texts: list[str])
methods.description: Selects the next domain to inquire about, inferring covered topics from patient texts.

methods.name: list[dict] _build_dialogue(self, conversation: Conversation)
methods.description: Converts stored conversation messages into AI-compatible dialogue turns.

methods.name: bool _should_conclude(self, meta: dict, next_domain: str | None)
methods.description: Decides whether to generate a concluding summary instead of another follow-up question.

ctags.name: __init__
ctags.pattern: /^    def __init__(self, ai: AIClient | None = None) -> None:$/

ctags.name: __init__
ctags.pattern: /^    def __init__(self, ai: AIClient | None = None) -> None:$/

ctags.name: __init__
ctags.pattern: /^    def __init__(self, base_dir: str | None = None) -> None:$/

ctags.name: _determine_next_domain
ctags.pattern: /^    def _determine_next_domain(self, meta: dict, patient_texts: list[str]) -> str | None:$/

ctags.name: _should_conclude
ctags.pattern: /^    def _should_conclude(self, meta: dict, next_domain: str | None) -> bool:$/

ctags.name: _update_coverage
ctags.pattern: /^    def _update_coverage(self, meta: dict, next_domain: str | None) -> None:$/

ctags.name: append_messages
ctags.pattern: /^    def append_messages(self, conversation_id: uuid.UUID, messages: List[Tuple[str, str]]) -> Co/

ctags.name: generate_note
ctags.pattern: /^    def generate_note(self, conversation: Conversation, note_title: str = "") -> Tuple[str, str]/

ctags.name: save_text_file
ctags.pattern: /^    def save_text_file(self, filename: str, content: str) -> dict:$/

ctags.name: start_conversation
ctags.pattern: /^    def start_conversation(self, patient_id: str, metadata: dict | None = None) -> Conversation:$/
ctags.signature: (self, patient_id: str, metadata: dict | None = None)
